doc.name: Accelerometer
doc.description:
This actor uses three output ports to output the x, y, and z measurements from an accelerometer.

The code generator supplies the method contents, thus this class has no methods.
doc.author: Robert Bui
doc.port: The accX output port. If this port is connected, then its input will determine whether an output is produced in any given firing. The type is double.
The accY output port. If this port is connected, then its input will determine whether an output is produced in any given firing. The type is double.
The accZ output port. If this port is connected, then its input will determine whether an output is produced in any given firing. The type is double.
